headline: Applied Optoelectronics Earnings, Revenue Guidance Top Estimates
summary: AAOI stock climbed after Applied Optoelectronics reported Q4 earnings and revenue that topped estimates as the company ramps up manufacturing.

raw.headline: Applied Optoelectronics Earnings, Revenue Guidance Top Estimates
raw.summary: AAOI stock climbed after Applied Optoelectronics reported Q4 earnings and revenue that topped estimates as the company ramps up manufacturing.

headline: CNBC Daily Open: Netflix bows out from Warner Bros. Discovery bidding war
summary: Netflix on Thursday stateside said it declined to raise a counteroffer for Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets.

raw.headline: CNBC Daily Open: Netflix bows out from Warner Bros. Discovery bidding war
raw.summary: Netflix on Thursday stateside said it declined to raise a counteroffer for Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets.

headline: Netflix ditches deal for Warner Bros. Discovery after Paramount’s offer is deemed superior
summary: Netflix is ditching a deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets after the WBD board deemed a revised bid by Paramount to be superior.

raw.headline: Netflix ditches deal for Warner Bros. Discovery after Paramount’s offer is deemed superior
raw.summary: Netflix is ditching a deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets after the WBD board deemed a revised bid by Paramount to be superior.

headline: Netflix CEO Sarandos visited White House right before streamer said WBD deal is off
summary: President Donald Trump last weekend demanded that Netflix fire former Obama administration official Susan Rice from its board or else “pay the consequences.”

raw.headline: Netflix CEO Sarandos visited White House right before streamer said WBD deal is off
raw.summary: President Donald Trump last weekend demanded that Netflix fire former Obama administration official Susan Rice from its board or else “pay the consequences.”
